column5: Throwing a Chug Bug off the causeway at Mitchell Lake, got a few strikes but the only one that latched on was this guy. Took it down so deep I had to cut the line and remove the lure backward through the gill. Just a quick pic while the hook was slowly working its way into my finger, fortunately didn't get too far. Fish was released and swam away immediately, no doubt with an unbelievable story to tell his buddies.
Haha what luck eh... nice fish though, I'm sure you'll catch a bass next time hehe
A perfect eater...hopefully some good fishing karma coming your way for letting her swim

That is the way it goes.  He is a healthy looking lad.  Hopefully you made a deal with him that requires complete secrecy on what happened.  That is what I do.  I point my finger at them and say "You don't tell a bloody soul about this".  To my knowledge, no fish I released have ever broken their silence.
Any day fishing, is a good day Thanks and tite lines   Paul
